recommendations.title: Right-Sizing EC2 Instances
recommendations.description: Analyze EC2 instance utilization and right-size instances to reduce costs.  Identify underutilized instances and scale up to more powerful configurations.
steps: Use AWS Cost Explorer to identify high-cost EC2 instances.
Analyze instance utilization metrics (CPU, memory, network I/O).
Right-size instances based on actual workload.
Consider using Spot Instances for non-critical workloads.

recommendations.title: Optimize Database Costs
recommendations.description: Review database usage patterns and optimize queries to reduce database costs. Consider using read replicas.
steps: Consider using read replicas for read-heavy workloads.

recommendations.title: Leverage Free Tier for CDN
recommendations.description: Utilize AWS CloudFront for content delivery to reduce load on the backend and lower costs.

recommendations.title: Explore Open Source Alternatives for Load Balancing
recommendations.description: Evaluate Google Cloud Load Balancing for cost-effective load balancing.
steps: Research Google Cloud Load Balancing options.
Implement a simple load balancer configuration.
